definitions.definition: A minor attraction at a larger event such as a circus , fair or music festival .
An incidental spectacle that diverts attention from a larger concern .
An incident in which drivers block traffic to perform stunts like donuts and burnouts for an extended period of time.

main_definition: A minor attraction at a larger event such as a circus , fair or music festival .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) An incidental spectacle that diverts attention from a larger concern .
( US slang ) An incident in which drivers block traffic to perform stunts like donuts and burnouts for an extended period of time.
